column4: ok, i want to install a game(specifically ut2004) but i can't figure out how to install it from the .sh file. Any help would be very nice and appreciated..:)
first, you're _sure_ it's not available in the repos or a deb file elsewhere?
Yes i bought the game on cd
Okay.  Then you will need to make the script executable ('chmod +x /path/to/file'), then run it '/path/to/file', or if in the current directory, './file')
